original_text: The Lord replied, ‘You may believe in God only a very little bit, like a very small seed. Even if you only believe that little bit, you could say to this tree, “Pull yourself out of the ground and plant yourself in the sea.” Then the tree would obey you.
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 너희에게 겨자씨 한 알만한 믿음이 있었더라면 이 뽕나무더러 뿌리가 뽑혀 바다에 심기어라 하였을 것이요 그것이 너희에게 순종하였으리라

sentences.original_text: You may believe in God only a very little bit
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 아주 조금만 믿을 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: Even if you only believe that little bit
you could say to this tree
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 나무에게 말할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Pull yourself out of the ground
and plant yourself in the sea
Then the tree would obey you
